# Workspace settings

## Recommended extensions

Open the Command Palette (`Ctrl+Shift+P` / `Cmd+Shift+P`) and run **Extensions: Show Recommended Extensions** to see and install these:

| Extension | Why |
|-----------|-----|
| **C#** (ms-dotnettools.csharp) | C# language support, IntelliSense, debugging for Unity scripts |
| **.NET Runtime** (ms-dotnettools.vscode-dotnet-runtime) | Lets the C# extension run properly |
| **YAML** (redhat.vscode-yaml) | Syntax/schema for `.unity` and other YAML files |
| **Unity Cursor Toolkit** (rankupgames.unity-cursor-toolkit) | Hot reload, Unity ↔ Cursor connection, status bar |
| **Unity Snippets** (YclepticStudios.unity-snippets) | MonoBehaviour snippets (Start, Update, etc.) |

After adding new recommendations, reload or run “Developer: Reload Window” if the list doesn’t update.
